## CreateCheckoutSessionOptions.timeoutMillis property

Time to wait (in milliseconds) until the session is created and acknowledged by Stripe. If not specified, defaults to [CREATE\_SESSION\_TIMEOUT\_MILLIS](./firestore-stripe-payments.create_session_timeout_millis.md)<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
timeoutMillis?: number;
```
